name: Alliance Captain
definition: The Team Representative of the highest ranked team that is asked to invite an available team to join his or her alliance.

name: Alliance Selection
definition: The process of choosing the permanent alliances for the Elimination Matches.

name: Autonomous Points (AP)
definition: The second basis of ranking teams. Autonomous Points are awarded in the amount of Autonomous Bonus points earned by an Alliance in a Qualifying Match.

name: Disqualification
definition: A penalty applied to a team for a rules violation. When a team is disqualified in a Qualifying Match they receive zero (0) WP, AP, and SP. When a team is disqualified in an Elimination Match the entire alliance is disqualified and they receive a loss for the match.

name: Elimination Match
definition: A match used to determine the championship alliance. Alliances of three (3) face off in a best two (2) of three (3) series, with two teams playing in each match. The first alliance to win two (2) matches will proceed to the next round.

name: Practice Match
definition: An un-scored match used to provide time for teams to get acquainted to the official playing field.

name: Qualifying Match
definition: A match used to determine the rankings for the Alliance Selection. Alliances compete to earn Win Points, Autonomous Points, and Strength of Schedule Points.

name: Strength of Schedule Points (SP)
definition: The third basis of ranking teams. Strength of Schedule Points are awarded in the amount of the score of the losing alliance in a Qualifying Match.

name: Team Representative
definition: A student chosen to represent their team during Alliance Selection for the final Elimination Matches.

name: Win Points (WP)
definition: The first basis of ranking teams. Win Points are awarded for winning (two points) and tying (one point) a Qualifying Match.
